Quickplots¶

Python charts made easy¶

Quickplots is an object-oriented plotting library for Python 3, with simplicity and intuition as its principal aims.

A simple example¶

The code:

data = [(x, x ** 2) for x in range(1, 16)]
bar = quickplots.BarChart(data, title="Squares")
bar.x_limit = [0.5, 15.5]
bar.x_ticks = [0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14]
bar.show()
